subtitle: Use any white fish for this rich fish recipe. Serve with freshly cooked pasta or potatoes.

method.text: Preheat grill. Place fish in grill pan and spread <sup>1</sup>/<sub>3</sub> of the butter over them. Grill for 5 min.
Meanwhile, mash cheese with remaining butter, milk and seasoning. Turn fish steaks over and spread cheese mixture on top.
Grill gently for further 8-10 min or until topping has melted and is golden brown and fish is cooked through. Serve hot.

title: Halibut with Gorgonzola
